duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with surgical procedures by providing necessary surgical instruments, supplies, and equipment with maximum efficiency and aseptic technique.
Prepare the operating room for surgery by checking the case cart and preference sheet, and aseptically opening instruments, supplies, and/or equipment.
Set up and maintain sterile field and assist during the case by providing the surgical team with necessary surgical instruments, sponges, sutures, and medications.
Maintain and assist efficiently within the sterile field, participating with the sponge, needle, and instrument counts.
Communicate pertinent information to the circulating nurse for continuity of patient care and assist in room clean-up at the completion of the surgical case.
Transport laboratory, surgical instruments, and/or supplies as needed/requested and notify appropriate healthcare team members of any observed condition or change in patient's condition.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in Surgical Technology or specialized training in the Armed Forces, Surgical Technician Certification preferred, and BLS Certification
